activities: SciQuest uses personal information that it receives from the EU/EEA and Switzerland for marketing activities as permissible under applicable law. In addition, in the normal course of using SciQuest’s spend management solutions that are made available on a subscription basis over the Internet to SciQuest’s customers, customers enter data, including personal information, into the spend management solutions. This personal information is generally limited to an individual’s business contact information or role in the customer’s organization. The spend management solutions reside on SciQuest’s servers and are accessible only through password protected webpages that require customers to log in. SciQuest does not select the data that customers upload into the spend management solutions. SciQuest accesses and uses the data solely to provide, and enhance customers’ use of, the spend management solutions, in accordance with customer agreements and instructions.
corpofftitle1: General Counsel and VP Corporate Development
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal information is generally limited to an individual’s business contact information or role in the organization.
recoursemech: We have subscribed to BBB EU Safe Harbor as our dispute resolution provider.
